description: This file is a source code for a Todo List component/page built with Qwik framework, defining components, route loaders, actions, and associated styles.

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Route loader that initializes and provides access to the list of to-do items.

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Route action that handles adding new items to the list, with validation using Zod.
